tossup_question: 15) BIOLOGY  In prokaryotic [proh-Kr-ee-OT-ik] DNA replication, what enzyme is responsible for unwinding the DNA double helix?
bonus_question: 15) BIOLOGY  If a cell has 8 chromosomes during mitotic prophase, how many chromosomes will it have during metaphase and anaphase?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) 16 in metaphase, 8 in anaphase 
X) 8 in metaphase, 8 in anaphase 
Y) 8 in metaphase, 4 in anaphase 
Z) 4 in metaphase, 8 in anaphase
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) 8 IN METAPHASE, 8 IN ANAPHASE
